entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
